channel.title: [317] Updated Battlescape client! Contains newest real RS sprites..! [317]
channel.description:
I updated the old Battlescape client with the newest sprites, hope you like it :)
[b]I didnt think over it, but am I the first one to make a 317 client with these new sprites? O;[/b]
Real topic: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,469173.0.html
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2i71mat.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2a9cett.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2rp7dbr.jpg[/img]
[b]Client link: http://uppit.com/qng7mo8itlbw/BattleScape_Client.rar[/b]
Enjoy the updated client!
Peace over and out /Vengpwe
